alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Mills (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Fremont and south central Mills Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1100 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles southwest of Tabor, or 15 miles northeast of Nebraska City, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Randolph around 1110 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 29 near mile marker 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southwestern Iowa.
